column2: as any great symphony needs a great conductor; a great restaurant needs a great Maître d'hôte. Much of the reason that 'Smoque BBQ' is so successful
column3: especially given the high-volume and continuous-flow seating needs of their guests;  'front-of-house' expert and Maître d'hôte Carlos. His passion is a genuine passion--a continual attention to his guests--wants and needs. An enthusiasm one finds
column4: only at food palaces such as Tour d'Argent in Paris.
